title: For Sale:  PSD 80% Lower Receiver
postcontent:
Can be Purchased on
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00EEC5QZO

Forged 7075-T6 alunimum
Tumbled and de-burred
Mil-spec cuts
Flashing removed from key areas

Palmetto State Defense 80% lower receiver. 7075 Aluminum Forging. You will need to complete the last 20% in order for it to be considered a firearm. There are many sites and videos dedicated to showing you how this process is completed. The operations left to be completed are as follows/ fire control group, trigger pin, hammer pin, trigger slot and the safety selector hole. As determined by the firearms technology branch of the ATF, this lower receiver is not classified as a "firearm" as defined by the GCA of 1968.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Charter Arms Undercover .38 Special
postcontent:
"CHARTER ARMS CORP. over STRATFORD CONN." This is the stamp on the right side of the barrel. According to my research this is production volume and years produced ~315,000 - <1,088,000 - ~1974 to 1991. This revolver is a GEN 1 Charter Arms. Without getting to far into the story of how I came to own this revolver. I purchased it from an elder woman who found it in her house. She said it belonged to her husband. It hadn't been handled in years. I cleaned, oiled it and shot it. Shoots great. Sights are great. I am not really a fan of trench sights but these were very easy to align on target. Shot about 15 rounds and then I let my Girlfriend shoot it. She loved it. She is definitely not a shooter. 

Gun comes with uncle mikes holster. An older box of .38 wad cutter bullets, 3 bullets shy of a full box. A brand new box of .38 FMJ, box is 2/3 full. The wad cutters came with the gun I don't know enough about the ammo to give someone solid information.

I am open to trades but I want pictures of the trade item the more pictures the better. 

Price is firm. CPL and Drivers license required for purchase. I will require a Bill of Sale for my records.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Colt Single Action Buntline Scout
postcontent:
Colt Single Action Buntline Scout in 22 magnum. This revolver was made in 1959, Colt didn't market them until 1960. This means that this was one of the first productions of this revolver in this caliber. The revolvers with both cylinders wasn't made until 1964, so this one is marked 22 magnum. 
Three gunsmiths have looked at this revolver and all say that it is unfired, it looks that way to me too. 
The guy I purchased it from says his father bought it and loaded it, then put it in a holster and never fired it. I have the holster to go with it also. This is a clean revolver.

title: For Sale:  Chinese Pre-ban AK Drums
postcontent:
I have a few AK drums up for sale, these function perfectly, are lightly used and in great shape. Springs are stiff and these feed flawlessly. You can keep these stored without tension on the spring until you are ready to use. Just wind it up and your set. These are true "pre-ban" collector drums, haven't been imported since the late 80's when Bush Sr. thought we didn't need pistol grips and bayo lugs. Getting hard to find in this condition and will always keep going up in value!

*All drums are factory cut for the Type 81 LMG. That means they are compatible with that rifles bolt which remains open when the drum is empty. Also means they are a bit more rare!

I have 4 Telescopes and this is the largest, nicest one of the bunch.  It is an 8" Dobsonian by Orion, the most respected name in Astronomy.  The tube is 5 Feet Long!
Go to:

http://www.telescope.com/Telescopes/Dobsonian-Telescopes/IntelliScope-Dobsonians/Orion-SkyQuest-XT8i-IntelliScope-Dobsonian-Telescope/pc/1/c/12/sc/27/p/102012.uts?refineByCategoryId=27

This is one of the very finest Telescopes you can acquire for home use...anything stronger would darn near have to be purchased through NASA!!!

Orion SkyQuest XT8i IntelliScope Dobsonian Telescope
4.9 / 5
Open Ratings Snapshot 
4.8 / 5
Read all 74 reviews  
Write a review

Free Standard Shipping

•Large Dobsonian reflector telescope with 8" aperture allows you to see faint deep-sky objects such as nebulas and galaxies, in addition to fantastic views of the Moon and planets
•Locating those faint deep-sky objects is simple with the IntelliScope Computerized Object Locator - it includes more than 14,000 objects in its database, and points you right to each one
•Select the object you wish to view from the IntelliScope database, then simply follow the directional arrows displayed on the hand controller by moving the telescope until the object is right in the eyepiece field of view - it's easy!
•The ultra-stable Dobsonian telescope base keeps the reflector optical tube perfectly balanced for easy point-and-view use
•A precise Crayford focuser allows use of larger format 2" telescope eyepieces - the bright, wide-field view of the Andromeda galaxy in a low power 2" eyepiece is jaw-dropping!

*The largest Telescope recommended for home use!

postcontent:
This Sig Sauer P938 is a Distributor Exclusive. Features the Polished(Mirror Finish) Blue Slide with Factory Engraving, Night Sights, Ambi Safety, 6 & 7rd Extended magazines. Brand New & Hard to find!!

SEE MORE PICS ON OUR ONLINE STORE

With the introduction of the P938, SIG SAUER now offers the ballistic advantage of the 9mm cartridge in a platform similar in size to the best-selling P238 pistol. A single-action-only trigger, coupled with full-size SIGLITE® Night Sights makes the P938 handle like a much larger pistol, yet is still easy to carry concealed.

With dimensions just slightly larger than its .380ACP counterpart, the P938 packs six plus one rounds of
9mm into an all-metal frame. The cocked-and-locked single-action trigger gives the P938 unmatched

DESCRIPTION:	 	 	 
The micro-sized .380s that have arrived on the scene in recent years have reduced dimensions to the point that they are difficult to control even for the most accomplished shooters. The CZ 83's combination of small size and moderate weight easily handles the new generation of high-performance defensive ammo that has become available for 'pocket' pistol calibers from leading ammo manufacturers. The DA/SA trigger mechanism operates in the same manner as the CZ 75. The 83 can be carried 'cocked and locked' with the hammer back and the safety on for single action operation, or it may be manually decocked for hammer-down carry. When carried in the decocked position, the safety lever does not need to be de-activated, but instead the first shot is double action and subsequent shots are single action. The CZ 83 features an ambidextrous manual safety and magazine catch.

Along with its superior shootability, the 83 boasts twice the magazine capacity (12+1 in .380) of its tiny competitors.

title: For Sale:  Colt Defender 07000DZ
postcontent:
07000DZ Custom Colt Defender in .45 ACP.  This is the factory ported model with two round ports. Gun is in excellent condition, I purchased this new and have fired approximately 500 trouble free rounds through it since then. It has been completely reliable with a variety of ammunition and bullet styles including SWC’s and it is incredibly accurate.  Comes with two original Colt magazines w/the orange polymer follower, case, manual, etc.  
All of the information I have been able to find indicates that Colt made no more than 20 of the 07000DZ Custom Colt Defenders all in 1999. This is not to be confused with the run of 100 Lew Horton Defenders with four slot shaped ports that were Magna-Ported 07000D’s .  
Some info on the Colt Defenders I found on the 1911 forum:
There are 5 Defender Models.

07000D Colt Defender .45ACP
07000DZ Custom Colt Defender .45 ACP
07860D Colt Defender Plus 45ACP
07040D Colt Defender 40 S&W
07040DZ Custom Colt Defender 40 S&W

The 07000D is still in production. Early models had a high grip safety, late production models use the lower XSE style grip safety. A matte black finish was an option in 1999.

The 07000DZ is a Colt Custom shop ported Defender. Colt says less than 20 were made, all during 1999.
07860D is the Defender Plus, which has a full length grip and holds an additional round. This gun was intoduced in 2003 and discontinued in 2004.
07040D was cataloged from 1999 to 2002. It also had a matte black finish option in 1999. Total production of 40 cal Defenders is supposed to be less than 2000.
07040DZ is a Colt Custom Shop ported Defender in .40 S&W, made in 1999 in very small numbers, less than 20.
Lou Horton commissioned a run of 100 ported Defenders in 45 acp. These can be identified by their four ports. 

FOID, bill of sale and 72 hour wait required. 
For sale only, no trade offers please. Ridiculous offers will be ignored, no offense.

postcontent:
BROWNING PROSTEEL SPORTER 20 GUN SAFE

Proven gun safe security and added convenience are yours with a Sporter safe. These value packed models offer high-security features at a price that will leave you giddy. A heavy 12-gauge steel body, a rigid 1-inch thick formed door with a rugged Force Deflector Lock System and an honest 1200 F/45 Minute Fire Rating to put your mind and wallet at ease. Our Duo-Plus interior package, combined with the DPX door panel provides a wide range of storage options.
The well designed layout of the interior of the safes allows users to easily organize firearms and other items that need safe keeping. The top half of the safe door features the DPX storage system that boasts a variety of pockets and pouches for more storage. The DPX Storage System features a gun rack on the safe door for more storage and easier access to your most used firearms. Don’t settle for a mere gun cabinet or locker to protect your valuables when you can get a level of protection the Browning Sporter Series offers. Sporter safes are packed with the type of real security and fire protection features you demand to ensure your valuables stay yours.

KEY FEATURES:
1200F/45 Min. Fire Protection
Thick 1-inch formed door with three-sided locking bolts
DPX Storage System on top half of door back

ANTI-PRY FEATURES:
12 Gauge Steel Body

Deluxe Three-Spoke Handle
Elevated Floor Makes Removing Guns Easier
Scroll Graphic on the Door
DPX Storage System on top half of Door Back

FIRE PROTECTION:
1200F/45 Min. Fire Protection
Two Layers of .5-inch Fire Resistant Insulation in the Body and Door
Palusol Expanding Fire Seal

SPORTER 20 DIMENSIONS:
58x30x20
Cubic Feet: 20
Weight: 490 lbs.
Locking Bolts: 8/5 Active
Gun Capacity: 8/16+7 DPX

BODY THICKNESS: 12 GAUGE STEEL
The thickness of the steel that comprises the safe body. A smaller gauge number means thicker steel, which provides more security than thinner steel.

1-INCH FORMED DOOR:
The 1-inch formed door is engineered with a rugged steel face, back, and reinforcement panels to provide excellent strength and attack protection compared to the competition.

FORCE DEFLECTOR LOCKING SYSTEM:
The Force Deflector Locking System (patent pending) prevents bolt or handle forces from reaching the lock by using a rotating cam device. It prevents energy transfer to the lock better than most systems used in the safe industry.

LOCKING BOLTS: 1-INCH CHROME
The rugged steel pieces that move behind the door frame to actually hold the safe door locked and closed. Bigger bolts, and more of them, provide greater security.

REINFORCED DOOR FRAME:
The door opening of the safe, strengthened by U-shaped steel channels, is welded around the entire perimeter to create added pry and attack resistance.

180 DEGREE HEAVY DUTY HINGES:
Rugged hinges are machined from solid steel bar stock for strength. The hinges allow the door to swing open 180 degree for unhindered access to the safe interior. Hinge-side locking bolts maintain full security even if the hinges are cut off. The door is removable to simplify moving of the safe.

DPX STORAGE SYSTEM:
The patented Duo-Plus Extra Storage System is the most versatile Browning ProSteel safe interior ever. This system maximizes gun storage space by including a modular system of door mounted racks for long guns as well as pouches and pockets for pistols and other valuables. Whereas many competitors offer these features as upgrades, the DPX storage system is a standard option on many Browning safes.
Click Here for a Detailed Article and Video on the DPX Storage System-
http://youtu.be/iyX67e22WW4

UL SECURITY CONTAINER RATING:
The industry standard test and rating for home/personal safes. Requires minimum construction specifications and passing a laboratory attack test. Premium Browning ProSteel safes far exceed the minimum requirements for the UL Residential Security (Tool Attack) listing.

LAYERS OF INSULATION:
The most important factor in fire protection is the total thickness of the insulation in the safe. More insulation means more protection from fire. Browning ProSteel safes use .5-inch thick gypsum panels, so the number of layers multiplied by .5-inch shows the total insulation thickness in inches.

FIRE RATING: 1200F/45 MIN. FIRE PROTECTION
A laboratory measurement of time and temperature (in Fahrenheit) used to compare the relative amount of fire resistance provided by a safe. A Browning ProSteel safe with a longer fire rating time provides more fire protection than a safe with a shorter time.

S&G MECHANICAL DIAL LOCK STANDARD

S&G ELECTRONIC LOCK UPGRADE AVAILABLE*
The S&G Electronic Lock is an advanced security system manufactured by the leader in the lock industry. Includes many technical security features. Standard on NRA.

SECURAM BIOMETRIC LOCK UPGRADE AVAILABLE*
The SecuRam Biometric Lock uses the uniqueness of an individual fingerprint as the combination in this advanced security solution. The lock opens with either a fingerprint or a multi-digit code. It is highly secure and operates very quickly. Simple programming instructions. LCD Screen.

MANUFACTURER LIFETIME REPLACEMENT WARRANTY
UL LISTED

BODY THICKNESS: 12 GAUGE STEEL
The thickness of the steel that comprises the safe body. A smaller gauge number means thicker steel, which provides more security than thinner steel.

1-INCH FORMED DOOR:
The 1-inch formed door is engineered with a rugged steel face, back, and reinforcement panels to provide excellent strength and attack protection compared to the competition.

FORCE DEFLECTOR LOCKING SYSTEM:
The Force Deflector Locking System (patent pending) prevents bolt or handle forces from reaching the lock by using a rotating cam device. It prevents energy transfer to the lock better than most systems used in the safe industry.

LOCKING BOLTS: 1-INCH CHROME
The rugged steel pieces that move behind the door frame to actually hold the safe door locked and closed. Bigger bolts, and more of them, provide greater security.

REINFORCED DOOR FRAME:
The door opening of the safe, strengthened by U-shaped steel channels, is welded around the entire perimeter to create added pry and attack resistance.

180 DEGREE HEAVY DUTY HINGES:
Rugged hinges are machined from solid steel bar stock for strength. The hinges allow the door to swing open 180 degree for unhindered access to the safe interior. Hinge-side locking bolts maintain full security even if the hinges are cut off. The door is removable to simplify moving of the safe.

DPX STORAGE SYSTEM:
The patented Duo-Plus Extra Storage System is the most versatile Browning ProSteel safe interior ever. This system maximizes gun storage space by including a modular system of door mounted racks for long guns as well as pouches and pockets for pistols and other valuables. Whereas many competitors offer these features as upgrades, the DPX storage system is a standard option on many Browning safes.

The industry standard test and rating for home/personal safes. Requires minimum construction specifications and passing a laboratory attack test. Premium Browning ProSteel safes far exceed the minimum requirements for the UL Residential Security (Tool Attack) listing.

LAYERS OF INSULATION:
The most important factor in fire protection is the total thickness of the insulation in the safe. More insulation means more protection from fire. FIRE RATING: 1200F/45 MIN. FIRE PROTECTION

title: For Sale:  Precision AR-15
postcontent:
http://s201.photobucket.com/user/ImaShooter/slideshow/Precision%20AR%20for%20sale

I built this AR as a precision rifle.  We are looking at buying a house, so I need cash.  I will have to build another, probably very close to this, once things settle down.

The best I have gotten out of it so far is about 1.1 MOA, shooting Federal GMM 69gr.  I am confident the problem was me, not the rifle, but I cannot promise anything.  I have shot about 200 rounds through it, starting with the shoot one, clean for 10 rounds, then shoot 10 clean for the first hundred.  The rifle has been through a couple different configurations, which is one reason I never got to fully wring it out.

The current parts list:

Yankee Hill lower http://yankeehillmachine.com/
DPMS lopro upper, lapped http://www.dpmsinc.com/
18" SPR profile barrel by Mike Rock, Rock Creek Barrels http://www.rockcreekbarrels.com/
Troy / VTAC BattleRail Alpha 15″ http://troyind.com/%20/partners/viking-tactics/troy-vtac-battlerail-alpha-15
Stark SE-1 grip http://starkequipment.com/
Bushmaster A2 stock w/J&H LimbSaver A2 Recoil Pad http://www.arrecoilless.net/JH-LimbSaver-A2-Recoil-Pad-P47.aspx
Geissele SD-E trigger http://geissele.com/superdynamicenhanced.aspx
DPMS lower parts kit
generic barrel nut
Harris 1A2-BR Bipod Sling Swivel Stud Mount 6" to 9" Black http://www.midwayusa.com/product/125693/harris-1a2-br-bipod-sling-swivel-stud-mount-6-to-9-black
Yankee Hill bipod adapter 
BT01-QK - Standard height Stud Mount with QK01 Quick Knob http://www.accu-shot.com/catalog/product_info.php?products_id=32
BT03 - M1-A/AR-15 Sling Stud Accessory http://www.accu-shot.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=21&products_id=86
Miculek comp http://www.brownells.com/rifle-parts/barrel-parts/compensators/ar-15-miculek-comp-prod5573.aspx
Rock River chrome bolt carrier assembly https://www.rockriverarms.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=category.display&category_id=377
BCM Gunfighter Mod 4 (medium) charging handle http://www.bravocompanyusa.com/BCM-GUNFIGHTER-Charging-Handle-GFH-Mod-4-p/bcm%20gfh%20mod%204%20556.htm

The rifle is wearing a black Stark grip.  I also have a Stark SE-2 with the sling attachment point in Flat Dark Earth, and a black Hogue grip with finger grooves.  Should the buyer wish, either of those could be swapped for the existing grip.

If the buyer can legally own 20 or 30 round magazines, I will include a magazine of their choice, either 30 round aluminum, or 20 or 30 round translucent smoke Lancer L5, with the rifle.  Additional magazines are negotiable for the buyer of the rifle, but the magazines are not for sale separately.

I have over $1500 in the rifle, plus all the associated shipping charges over the several years it took to build it.  I am asking $1300, to include shipping in the hard case seen in the pictures to any legal area in the CONUS.  If you are local to the Huntsville, AL area you can pick it up in person for $1250.  USPS money orders only, or cash in person.

Note that this will be posted in multiple places, so do NOT IM!  Email only please!  Inquiries will be responded to in the order they are received.  At this time I prefer to keep the rifle intact.  Should a buyer wish to purchase the rifle without some parts or accessories, and I agree to do so, at that time I may make the other parts available.  Only if there is no interest in the complete rifle will I consider parting it out, so please refrain from claiming parts until and unless I post that they are available.

Email REDACTED
Arnie Elkins

title: For Sale:  BROWNING PROSTEEL SPORTER 20 GUN SAFE
location: 5927 N. Nevada Ave. Colorado Springs 80918, Denver, Colorado
postcontent:
BROWNING PROSTEEL SPORTER 20 GUN SAFE

Proven gun safe security and added convenience are yours with a Sporter safe. These value packed models offer high-security features at a price that will leave you giddy. A heavy 12-gauge steel body, a rigid 1-inch thick formed door with a rugged Force Deflector Lock System and an honest 1200 F/45 Minute Fire Rating to put your mind and wallet at ease. Our Duo-Plus interior package, combined with the DPX door panel provides a wide range of storage options.
The well designed layout of the interior of the safes allows users to easily organize firearms and other items that need safe keeping. The top half of the safe door features the DPX storage system that boasts a variety of pockets and pouches for more storage. The DPX Storage System features a gun rack on the safe door for more storage and easier access to your most used firearms. Don’t settle for a mere gun cabinet or locker to protect your valuables when you can get a level of protection the Browning Sporter Series offers. Sporter safes are packed with the type of real security and fire protection features you demand to ensure your valuables stay yours.

KEY FEATURES:
1200F/45 Min. Fire Protection
Thick 1-inch formed door with three-sided locking bolts
DPX Storage System on top half of door back

ANTI-PRY FEATURES:
12 Gauge Steel Body
1-Inch Chromed Locking Bolts
Three-Sided Door Coverage
Fully Reinforced Integrated Door Frame
Tight Tolerance Door Fit
1-Inch Formed Door

ADDITIONAL SECURITY FEATURES:
Force Deflector Locking System
Hardened Steel Pin Lock Protection
UL Tool Attack Listed
UL Group II lock with Five-Year Limited Warranty

INTERIOR/CONVENIENCE AND APPEARANCE FEATURES:
Deluxe Three-Spoke Handle
Elevated Floor Makes Removing Guns Easier
Scroll Graphic on the Door
DPX Storage System on top half of Door Back

FIRE PROTECTION:
1200F/45 Min. Fire Protection
Two Layers of .5-inch Fire Resistant Insulation in the Body and Door
Palusol Expanding Fire Seal

SPORTER 20 DIMENSIONS:
58x30x20
Cubic Feet: 20
Weight: 490 lbs.
Locking Bolts: 8/5 Active
Gun Capacity: 8/16+7 DPX

BODY THICKNESS: 12 GAUGE STEEL
The thickness of the steel that comprises the safe body. A smaller gauge number means thicker steel, which provides more security than thinner steel.

1-INCH FORMED DOOR:
The 1-inch formed door is engineered with a rugged steel face, back, and reinforcement panels to provide excellent strength and attack protection compared to the competition.

FORCE DEFLECTOR LOCKING SYSTEM:
The Force Deflector Locking System (patent pending) prevents bolt or handle forces from reaching the lock by using a rotating cam device. It prevents energy transfer to the lock better than most systems used in the safe industry.

LOCKING BOLTS: 1-INCH CHROME
The rugged steel pieces that move behind the door frame to actually hold the safe door locked and closed. Bigger bolts, and more of them, provide greater security.

REINFORCED DOOR FRAME:
The door opening of the safe, strengthened by U-shaped steel channels, is welded around the entire perimeter to create added pry and attack resistance.

180 DEGREE HEAVY DUTY HINGES:
Rugged hinges are machined from solid steel bar stock for strength. The hinges allow the door to swing open 180 degree for unhindered access to the safe interior. Hinge-side locking bolts maintain full security even if the hinges are cut off. The door is removable to simplify moving of the safe.

DPX STORAGE SYSTEM:
The patented Duo-Plus Extra Storage System is the most versatile Browning ProSteel safe interior ever. This system maximizes gun storage space by including a modular system of door mounted racks for long guns as well as pouches and pockets for pistols and other valuables. Whereas many competitors offer these features as upgrades, the DPX storage system is a standard option on many Browning safes.
Click Here for a Detailed Article and Video on the DPX Storage System-
http://youtu.be/iyX67e22WW4

UL SECURITY CONTAINER RATING:
The industry standard test and rating for home/personal safes. Requires minimum construction specifications and passing a laboratory attack test. Premium Browning ProSteel safes far exceed the minimum requirements for the UL Residential Security (Tool Attack) listing.

LAYERS OF INSULATION:
The most important factor in fire protection is the total thickness of the insulation in the safe. More insulation means more protection from fire. Browning ProSteel safes use .5-inch thick gypsum panels, so the number of layers multiplied by .5-inch shows the total insulation thickness in inches.

FIRE RATING: 1200F/45 MIN. FIRE PROTECTION
A laboratory measurement of time and temperature (in Fahrenheit) used to compare the relative amount of fire resistance provided by a safe. A Browning ProSteel safe with a longer fire rating time provides more fire protection than a safe with a shorter time.

S&G MECHANICAL DIAL LOCK STANDARD

S&G ELECTRONIC LOCK UPGRADE AVAILABLE*
The S&G Electronic Lock is an advanced security system manufactured by the leader in the lock industry. Includes many technical security features. Standard on NRA.

SECURAM BIOMETRIC LOCK UPGRADE AVAILABLE*
The SecuRam Biometric Lock uses the uniqueness of an individual fingerprint as the combination in this advanced security solution. The lock opens with either a fingerprint or a multi-digit code. It is highly secure and operates very quickly. Simple programming instructions. LCD Screen.

MANUFACTURER LIFETIME REPLACEMENT WARRANTY
UL LISTED

View Details & Pricing on our Website:
http://www.thesafetrader.com/browning-safes/sporter/

Click Here for Complete Safe Warranty Information:
http://www.browning.com/library/infonews/detail.asp?ID=199

Tel. 303.573.SAFE [7233]

http://www.facebook.com/thesafetrader
